fulltext:
Nguyên Đăc Phúc, Product
Owner/ Manager
HO CHI MINH CITY, VIETNAM
·
tomnguyen.067@gmail.com
PROFILE
An enthusiastic product lover, a technology entrepreneur and visionary with the thirst for
knowledge and hunger for creating impacts on society. A Vipassanā meditation practitioner.
EMPLOYMENT HISTORY
Project Manager/ Entrepreneur in Residence at Alley51
Oct 2018 – Apr 2019, Ho Chi Minh City
What we do
Alley51 Ventures is a data platform targets marginalized workers and people, engaging and
empowering them through many ground-breaking solutions. 
What I do
Envision, define and prioritize what features to be built
Contribute the growth and development of the recruitment product
B2B sales to manufacturers and factories sector
My key takeaways
How being likable is important to successful contributing to the team and influencing people
Define and implement great cultures to the company
Product Executive, VNG
Jul 2018 – Sep 2018, Ho Chi Minh
What I do
Leading a team of 7 senior designers & developers (Design, Front-end, Mobile, Back-end &
Server) to integrate ZaloPay's payment features into Zalo's platform
Designing logics, constraints, main flow and UX - UI of the product features
In charge of the Product Requirements Document as the key material to ensure transparent
communication within the development team
My key learning points
UX/ UI design for B2C digital wallet 
Industry-standard product & software development process 
Product Manager, EyeQ Tech
Jun 2017 – Jul 2018, Ho Chi Minh
EyeQ Tech, the Champion of Startup Wheel 2017, is a tech-startup developing and
commercializing Computer Vision and Deep Learning to revolutionize and disrupt the industries
of retailing, F&B, franchising, advertising and banking.
DETAILS
Ho Chi Minh City,
Vietnam
+84 764644141
NATIONALITY
Vietnamese
LINKS
LinkedIn
SKILLS
Project Management
Product Management &
Development
Leadership
Business Development
Computer Science &
Software
LANGUAGES
English
HOBBIES
Read 2 books/ week,
Gym 4 days/ week
What I do
Envisioning and defining what features, products and product lines to be built
Designing UX - UI of the products
Working directly with developers to manage the development, execution and delivery of
products
Customer relations, sales and business development
Operation management
My key learning points
Critical thinking - How to ask good question
How to be a team player, an empowering leader to influence cross-functional teams
Building industry-standard products applying advanced technologies, in variety of fields
(F&B, hospitality, advertising ...) 
Working closely with IT Founder & CEO of 2 uprising startups from the beginning
Pitch and win Startup Wheel 2017 - http://eyeq.tech/champion-startup-wheel-2017/
Project Manager, ShareCarForAds
Oct 2016 – May 2017
What I do
Manage a team of 8 internship developers, building a system to count how many people looking at
ads panel on vehicles using cameras combining with Deep Learning Face Detection/ Recognition
and MAC Address collecting technologies.
My key learning points
Project Planning & Management with Trello & Toggl for task-time management
Applied Agile scrum
Team management & leadership
Final evaluation of 9/10 for the individual and team performance
EDUCATION
University of Science, Bachelor of Computer Science
Oct 2013 – Oct 2017, Ho Chi Minh
EXTRA-CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES
Exchange Participant, Temasek Foundation - Singapore
Polytechnic
Jul 2014 – Aug 2014, Singapore
What I do
A course of Design Thinking process & graduation project with Singaporean undergraduates
Designed curriculum of History, Society, Culture & Economy of Singapore
1-month staying, living and discovering the amazement of Singapore
My key learning points
Native English - Singlish working environment
Teamwork, presentation skills, public speaking and logical thinking
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
